preqs: Students must have passed either ACW2491 or AFW2491 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {ACW3050, AFG3045, AFG3050, AFW3045, AFW3050}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACC3120, ACF3491, ACG3050, AFC3120, AFF3491, AFG3050}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACC2120, ACF2491, ACG2491, ACW2491, AFC2120, AFF2491, AFG2491, AFW2491} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

unitName: Advanced financial accounting theory and issues
description: Topics covered by this unit include: Australian accounting environment, theories of financial accounting, accounting for leases; accounting for employee benefits; accounting for financial instruments; cash flow reporting; public sector and agriculture accounting, segment reporting; accounting for EPS; accounting for extractive industries; foreign currency translation; and social and environmental reporting.
